translations: 万岁（表示祝愿或赞成的欢呼声）
口头测验，口试（等于viva voce）

sentences.sentence: Many thanks to all and allow me to say today: Viva España!
sentences.translation: 非常感谢所有人，今天我要说：活着，西班牙！

sentences.sentence: I’ve been to Viva twice now, and lost half a stone in a week both times.
sentences.translation: 我至今去过两次维娃中心，每次都在一个星期内减了半英石的体重 (译者注：1英石= 14 磅)。

sentences.sentence: Delighted to work, she was a dream client for the Viva agency and was an inspired woman.
sentences.translation: 沃佳诺娃工作得很开心，她是Viva代理公司的梦想客户，也是一个鼓舞人心的女人。
